attributes.action: Petition that Abortion should be put to people of this Country in Referendum.
attributes.additional_details: To let the Country and people vote on Assisted dying, by vote of a Referendum.
attributes.background: Petition that Abortion should be put to Country as Referendum and should not be left to MPs along, it must be voted on and Debated by people and voted by a Referendum.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730832
